A parking lot in front of the Igreja de Nossa Senhora da Anunciação de Tornada.
Excellent location, despite being next to N8.
Very close to Paul da Tornada, a nature reserve.
I recommend a visit.
In the roundabouts there are cafes, bars and restaurants.

title: (2510) Gaeiras - IP6
description: Just behind the convent of Sao Miguel (seems oddly abandoned despite recent outdoor installations). Several places in the shade of trees. Water, tables, artisanal barbecue (provide grill). Easy access. Proximity to Obidos. There are some spaces to park also between trees for a sprinter. Bit of noise from the highway. Mountain bike singletrack trails within 5 minutes on the smaller dirt tracks down towards the barragem.

title: (2500) Nadadouro - Lagoa de Óbidos

title: (2510-662) - Unnamed Road

title: (2510) Vau - Poça Pequena

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 43 Rua Francisco Almeida Grandela
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - 43 Rua Francisco Almeida Grandela

title: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Largo Francisco Sá Carneiro - Lagoa de Óbidos
title_short: (2500) Foz do Arelho - Largo Francisco Sá Carneiro - Lagoa de Óbidos
description: Parking space for mobile homes with all facilities available. Located right on the lagoon. Places without electricity are common. The sanitary building is open during the day from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. The toilet block also contains 1 cold shower and 1 hot shower (keys for hot showers at the reception). Washing area with cold water, emptying of gray and black water and rubbish point is included in the price. The car park itself is well maintained with semi-paved areas (pebbles), some with shade. Many Portuguese who have been there for a long time, all very friendly. Bread is available in the morning from 8:00 in the Marisol bar, 100 m from the campsite. There are also many restaurants along the water.

address.street: Largo Francisco Sá Carneiro - Lagoa de Óbidos

title: (2500) Nadadouro -

title: (2500) - Atlântica
description: Small place for one van by the sea with nice views and great sunsets. The access is a little tricky and is not recomended for anything bigger than a small camper, 4x4 would be better and If you do not have one do not go further down to the last platform as there is a large rock that will be difficult to get back over. No services just peace, when the wind is not to strong.

title: (2500-481) Foz do Arelho -

title: (2500) - Atlântica

I think it would be more respectful not to park on the beach (do it in the parking lot that is 6 meters higher) and park optimizing the parking space, even if you don't have the same views from the kitchen of your camper. Avoid camping with tables, awnings...etc.

description: Very nice place, near the ocean, the only thing to pay attention to the dirt road on the left, if you don't have a 4x4 vehicle it could be difficult to go

title: (2450-027) São Martinho do Porto - 9 Rua do Turista
title_short: (2450-027) São Martinho do Porto - 9 Rua do Turista
description: A water fountain tap to top up water, not sure if safe for drinking but good for cleaning water.

title: (2450-027) Salgado - 1 Rua do Turista
description: Very nice place van. Safe, restaurant opposite the beach too. Really great. Beautiful beach at 40 M! Paid parking, day night, for motorhomes from 11 a.m. to 8 p.m. or from 8 p.m. to 11 a.m. (the following day). Stable and flat solid ground. Right at the entrance to the beach. Note that free parking outside this car park is extremely limited in number of spaces. Huge beach but dangerous swimming because of the rather imposing waves. Restaurant/bar on the edge of the car park.

title: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Unnamed Road
title_short: (2460) São Martinho do Porto - Unnamed Road
description:
Incredible view of the beach, a little spot next to the road just above the village. great sunset, very calm.
the terrain is a bit difficult and not very even, so make sure to drive slowly. 
no problem spending the night here.

title: (2530) Reguengo Grande - 3 Rua do Cemitério
description: Prices

title: (2530) Reguengo Grande - 26 N247-1
description: Service area in Reguengo Grande village, Lourinhã county, offers free full service for maintenance, located in the Town Picnic Park. Interesting to visit the "Ishmael Tasca" bar where is served the best “ginginha” (cerise liquor) of the region.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - IC2
description: GasProCar Gasstation. Possibility to get foreign gas bottles filled. Filled our german bottle without problems.

title: (2520) Ferrel - 2 Travessa da Amizade
description: Free water! Yeah! Tastes fantástico and good flowspeed.

name: Parque de Campismo Urban Art Camping, Grupo Campigir
title: (2520-102) Parque de Campismo Urban Art Camping, Grupo Campigir
title_short: (2520-102) Parque de Campismo Urban Art Camping, Grupo Campigir
description: Urban Art Camping - Small campsite with surf camp and small shop.

title: (2520) Ferrel - 29 Rua da Saudade
description: Laundromat Pink Bubbles. Washing machines 10-27 kg , dryers 17-22 kg . Detergent and disinfection are included, payment only with cash. There is also WiFi, a snack vending machine and a washing and ironing service.

title: (2520-128) Ferrel - 14 Rua da Paz
description: Water tap. Lots of pressure. Works great!

title: (2540) Bombarral -
description: (ASA de BOMBARRAL) - free service area with overnight parking for ten motorhomes (some shadows, others not) about 200 m behind the hypermarket Modelo/Continente. Quiet and safe place, with 250 m flat pedestrian access to city center (crossing railway line) and traditional grossery and municipal market. Several supermarkets around, municipal forest in city, tourist office, railway station (line to Lisboa), municipal museum, library and theater; kart race. In surrounding, ex-libris garden “Jardim Buddha Éden", in Quinta dos Louridos farm (to which there is also pedestrian access from parking through two trails and agricultural fields. Several wine farms (Quintas dos Louridos, do Sanguinhal, das Cerejeiras and da Granja) where taste is possible. Feel at home and in a family atmosphere!...

title: (2520-133) Ferrel - 30 Rua da Quintinha
description: Very Nice self service laundry

title: (2540) Bombarral - Estrada do Urmal
description: Near the soccer field and a not too noisy kart circuit

title: (2520-101) Ferrel - 15 Rua Bela Morais
description: Quiet parking lot in a resudential area, right next to a beautiful beach. No facilities. Very quiet at night, no police, we saw no other campers.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 69 Estrada das Salinas
description:
Salinas de Rio Maior. Large gravel car park almost flat. 100m from the village, the saltworks and the shops. Very quiet night despite the proximity of the road, but not very busy at night.
Very typical village with its wooden houses and its very rare "terrestrial" saltworks. I also recommend the Solar do Sal Restaurant and its excellent Portuguese-style chicken at very moderate prices in a beautiful rustic setting. The owner is very friendly and speaks French. I recommend

title: (2040-133) Rio Maior - 39 Estrada das Salinas
description: Parking in Las Salinas, on the right side there is a parking lot in the shelter of the trees, with bathrooms. There is a restaurant nearby and small cabins that offer drinks and food. We arrived at the last minute and there was hardly anyone else. Recommended if you are in the Park and looking for a place to spend the night.

title: (2520) Ferrel - 21 Avenida da Praia
description: Ground parking with firm ground where it is not prohibited to park motorhomes. We have spent the night here with 7 other cars and campers without incident. You can hear the music from a local on the beach but it allows you to sleep without problems if you are not bothered by some noise. Ideal to stay in Baleal and enjoy the beach.

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - Rua da Barragem
title_short: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - Rua da Barragem
description: On an almost-island at the water's edge next to the dam. Not really flat, but quiet and beautiful view. We spent a day and a night there, the village is very close, with a bakery, etc. We feel far from everything, like on an island. Perfect for relaxing

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 5 Rua de São Domingos
title_short: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 5 Rua de São Domingos
description: Picnic area with benches and drinking water fountain

title: (2550-012) Alguber - R. Mapril Fogaca
description: Flat free parking, a lot of space in a magical small village

title: (2450) Casal Mota - 2 R. do Cossi
description: Water spring

title: (2525-553) Atouguia da Baleia - 18 N114
description: LPG station

title: (2040) Rio Maior - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
title_short: (2040) Rio Maior - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
description: Small parking at the indoor and outdoor pool. Normal street noise during the day, calm and lit at night. Pubelles, tap on a tennis court. No emptying! Toilets in the entrance area of the swimming pool. Intermarket 300m.

title: (2550) Cadaval - 20 Rua das Castanholas
description: Nice launderette, free WiFi available. Nearby is a park with playground.

title: (2040) - 33 Rua São Francisco de Assis
description: In the heart of the Serras de Aire e Candeeiros Natural Park, the Chãos-Alcobertas Service Área offers parking and overnight status for 5 motorhomes, as well as water and energy supply, loading and unloading and cleaning services for 1 vehicle. It is locate in a calm and pleasant place, with a Picnic área, set in a unique landscape. In the área you have access to 4 walking routes and a wide range of cultural and leisure activities. In the surroundings there is also a panoramic restaurant.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 6B Avenida Paulo VI
description: Quiet place at night and on weekends. Safe and surrounded by sports facilities. Flat floor and if you park where indicated, you have a view of the stadium lawn. Next to a picnic area and the training center.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 67 Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
title_short: (2040) Rio Maior - 67 Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
description: Quiet place at night and on weekends. Safe and surrounded by sports facilities. During school time, throughout the day, there is the normal movement of the students. Flat floor and if you park where indicated, you have a view of the stadium lawn.

title: (2525-520) Atouguia da Baleia - 41 Rua do Caldeirão
title_short: (2525-520) Atouguia da Baleia - 41 Rua do Caldeirão
description: Washing with clean and functioning lances, campers allowed but not over 6mt

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: Payment to pass the port, very close to the beach, no amenities, passable dirt road.

title: (2040) - Rua dos Potes Mouros
description: Follow signs '' formacao prismaticos basalticos ''. Spot with beautiful view of the serra, very very quiet, at the foot of the volcanic rock with natural water source 50m before, and small lake hidden 200m. Shady all morning! Gravel road very passable!

title: (2530-059) Lourinhã - 25 Rua Vale dos Dinossauros
description: Parking dino park. On the bus parking. In the heart of the forest. No light, no toilet or trash. We spent the night there, another motorhome joined us in the night.

name: Camping Silveira
title: (2460) Camping Silveira
description: It is a small rural campsite. Place under the pines, possible to have electricity, only one block of shower and WC and very clean. Welcomed by the owner who speaks French and who is really very nice.

name: Camping municipal de Péniche
title: (2520-206) Camping municipal de Péniche
description: Municipal campsite of Péniche opposite the beach with small supermarket, wifi access at the restaurant bar. cheap for campers and caravans.

title: (2520-206) Peniche - 14 Avenida Monsenhor Bastos
description: Parking of the restaurant xakra j just the one to cross direct sea access and fitted out dish of the day . perfect for 1 night no service only this parking is allowed others prohibited for motorhomes

title: (2460-479) Alcobaça - 92 N8-6
description: Possibility of filling UK propane canister they speak English and have a variety of connectors ( we were desperate). So relieved

title: (2520-206) Peniche - Avenida Monsenhor Bastos
description: LPG Station

title: (2520) Peniche - Avenida da Praia
description: Parking in front of a hotel

title: (2520-206) Peniche - 2520 N114
description:
Free water and air station
BP station

title: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
title_short: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
description: Nice picnic area with grills and sinks for washing dishes. In the building next door you'll find the toilets (didn't check if they were open. It's possible to stop even long campers, but parking is slanted.

title: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
title_short: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
description: Country house with a beautiful view of the Montejunto mountain, offers parking for motorhomes, caravans and tents. Allows contact with nature: space with animals such as chickens and goats. Possibility to purchase homemade products such as cheese, eggs and bread. Our motto is: "Happiness is in the simple things"

title: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua da Escola
description: Quiet picnic area Some tables available A small road in front but relatively quiet at this busy time (August) A few areas of shade, pleasant even in heavy heat (today 32 ° outside 26 ° ds the van)

title: (2520-620) Peniche - Consoloação
description: Parking 30m from the beach.possibility to sleep there to avoid the cc area near the city center (often crowded)

title: (2450) Nazaré - 9 En 242
description: Magnificent location facing the ocean. flat place. We entered through the port where we paid €170 for the right of access. This location is easily accessible for a large CC, plus the dirt road is hilly.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 30 Rua Doutor Francisco Zagalo
description: Potable water

title: (2520-402) Peniche - 34 Rua do Juncal
description: In high season you have to arrive at night or early in the morning to find a place. Perfect location for being just behind the dunes with access stairs to the beach, several surf shops, supermarket, cafes. We were blown away by the traffic during day and night, if you are susceptible to car noise, we do not recommend it for an overnight stay. During the day we surfed right there, so it was perfect to have her around.

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 19 Rua Moderna
description: Free camping car park with facilities (clean water suply, and grey and black water discharge). At the entrance of village and about 800 m from beach. Has a lot of parking places (about 30). The ground is dirt and more or less level.

title: (2520-620) Peniche - Consoloação
description: Not an excellent parking to stay but there are showers on the right side of the road next to the parking. There is also an access to the beach of Supertubos, by foot, via a bridge.

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 2 Rua Doutor Raquel Ribeiro
title_short: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 2 Rua Doutor Raquel Ribeiro
description: Parking next to the area, when it's full on weekends it's a good option, there are no services, very quiet, there were more motorhomes. Beach for surfing at 600m.

title: (2520-556) Peniche - 2 Travessa da Papoa
description: Parking by the road, sea view, have a night with other vans, camper not allow. Café restaurant do quebrado at the foot. Quiet place.

title: (2520) Peniche, Portugal - Avenida Monsenhor Bastos
description: How showers are available for people taking a lesson or renting surf equipment at Escole Surf Peniche. Cold showers outside also for customers. Please be respectful.

title: (2520-556) Peniche - 37 Largo da Ilha de Peniche
title_short: (2520-556) Peniche - 37 Largo da Ilha de Peniche
description: Quiet residential area, with shadows and plenty of parking space. Close to the beach of Perritos de Peniche.

title: (2520-484) Peniche - 38 Rua da Boa Viagem
description: Drinking water fountain

title: (2520) Peniche - 9 Rua da Ponte Velha
description: Drinking water and gray and black water disposal. Toilets and WiFi in the supermarket.

title: (2520-208) Peniche - 4 Avenida do Porto de Pesca
title_short: (2520-208) Peniche - 4 Avenida do Porto de Pesca
description: Large car park, without any service, fairly quiet, close to the city center. Right next to the Pingo Doce and Mini Preço supermarkets. Very good spot.

title: (2520) Peniche - 1 Largo do Socorro
description: Launderette Valsa das Ondas on the corner. WiFi, cafe next door.

title: (2520) Peniche - Rua da Alfândega
description: Sheltered parking area from the wind, it is next to the intermarche, near the entrance wall to Peniche. quiet area and close to the beach. We have seen several caravans and motorhomes in the same parking lot. good choice for vans with a pop-up roof.

title: (2520-202) Peniche - 22 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Public toilet with soap and towels :)

title: (2525-760) Atouguia da Baleia - 28 Rua da Praia
title_short: (2525-760) Atouguia da Baleia - 28 Rua da Praia
description: It has public bathrooms with a closed shower down the stairs that lead to the beach.

title: (2520-208) Peniche - 3 Avenida do Porto de Pesca
title_short: (2520-208) Peniche - 3 Avenida do Porto de Pesca
description: Laundromat with wi-fi. Huge parking lot (never full), grocery stores, china shops, restaurants. Parking unavailable last Thursday every month due to market. Toilets at Pingo Doce.

title: (2520-225) Peniche - 11 Beco dos Pescadores
description: Free possibility to wash (dishes and laundry by hand). Large traditional sink. Parking in front of it. Nice tip of a resident!

title: () Alcobaça - 21 Avenida dos Combatentes
description: Huge parking near the abbey, very steep, only to visit.

title: (2525-445) Atouguia da Baleia - 88 Avenida da Praia
title_short: (2525-445) Atouguia da Baleia - 88 Avenida da Praia
description: Tap at the top of the square

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 27 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - 27 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
description: Free parking, both sides of the road

address.street: 27 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade

title: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua Doutor Eduíno Borges Garcia
title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua Doutor Eduíno Borges Garcia
description: Parking next to the Alcobaça market, and very close to the historic center. It has no services. You can sleep well at night, there are shadows, and even some green space. The tourist post indicated that we could spend the night here. Saturday morning there is market next door, prepare to wake up at night while riding it ..

title: (2520-503) Peniche - 14 Travessa da Horta
description: Laundry with wifi and drinking water

title: () - Rua do Barreiro
description: Nature, panorama and tranquility! Corner to explore! Other places surely as nice as this one, chosen at random when leaving the summit route. Worth a visit for the villages with countless small stone walls characteristic of the place. In the heights of the natural park with magnificent views of the plains and surely on the Nazaré Sea (for us covered by a cloud bank in the distance). The site is at the entrance to one of the park's hikes, and has a pretty stone vestige and two uninhabited houses (one of which is open to the winds) in the middle of the pines. Not a cat in the middle of August, seems very little frequented (the foot!). Windy, very pleasant in hot weather, a little less on an evening of bad weather.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua de Leiria
description: Long, flat and very quiet car park a bit far from the center of Alcobaça. Behind Répsol. Nice clear view. Another French motorhome was there. Avoid Monday mornings because of a market.

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia -
description: Small, slightly sloping car park, park just before the car park in the grass. access from the bottom of the other car park already listed. we spent a very calm night with the added bonus of a beautiful sunset.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 33 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - 33 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
description: Motorhome area with services. Don't recommend filling up with drinking water as there is only one tap right over the black water disposal and probably being also used for rinsing cassettes. There are more water fountains in the area, but the taps have been removed.

address.street: 33 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade

title: (2520-322) Peniche - Rua da Liberdade 12
description: Peniche Motorhome Park. electricity (4A), water, drainage, wifi, surveillance camera, barbecue, small living room, tv, washing machine, shower and karcher to wash the vehicle, concrete location, speaks French and very nice, beach nearby, shops next door and center 10 minutes away.

title: (2520) Peniche, Portugal -
description: Possibility of loading water (I don't know if it is drinkable) at 50 cents / 30L at a car wash.

title: (2525) Atouguia da Baleia - 25 Rua Viola
description: Parking overlooking village and sea

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 21 Rua de Leiria
description: Laundromat. Detergent included in the machines. Payment by coins . In the top

title: () Alcobaça -
description: Laundromat 300m up towards the modern buildings. Choradqueira next door.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 29 Rua Mariana Coelho Bernardo
description: Boutique Cruz de Cristo, Camping-Gaz dealer who has stock of references 907 and 904 and small 400gr
